news.title: The Little Coffee Hut at Electric Picnic: Glorious coffee, hot food, delicious açaí bowls and more
news.summary: Electric Picnic is blessed with great food and beverage offerings – including The Little Coffee Hut...

news.title: Dylan Flynn and the Dead Poets Live at the Docklands (Photos)
DELUSH: "You’re always telling yourself that you’re worth it. But when you get that outside confirmation, it’s fuel"
news.summary: DELUSH are turning heads and cupping ears with their electrifying live shows and Boisterous indie anthems. They look forward to their EP set with Riccardo Dwyer.

news.title: Album Review: CMAT, EURO-COUNTRY
news.summary: Album Of The Month: Irish star delivers bona fide classic. 10/10

news.title: Kneecap's DJ Provaí: "We don’t really have that many differences with the DUP, except we seem to like the craic and they don’t"
news.summary: KNEECAP have become one of the most talked about and listened to bands in the world. Their unwavering support for the Palestinian cause, trumped up terrorism charges, the DUP, Paul Weller, Oasis and their Electric Picnic return are all discussed.
